title: Fix event listener memory leak in app.js
description: Lines 869-878: Event listeners are added on every render without cleanup. Clone nodes or remove listeners before adding new ones.

title: Make anti-patterns more actionable
description: Some anti-patterns are too obvious (Multiplier: 'Quality drops without your oversight') or too vague (Catalyst: 'Acting as a human bridge'). Add concrete signals to distinguish anti-pattern from normal behavior.

title: Add guidance for capability area specialists
description: capabilities.md raises issue of people not enjoying certain areas but provides no resolution. Add guidance on career paths for specialists who genuinely don't want to grow in all areas.

title: Cache CSS custom property lookups
description: getSvgColors() in app.js (line 1294) calls getComputedStyle() on every diagram render, triggering browser reflows. Cache values and invalidate only on theme change.

title: Consolidate 'Not Easier Path' sections
description: amplifier.md and pioneer.md have nearly identical 'Why This Is Not the Easier Path' sections. Consolidate into personas.md overview or shared content to reduce duplication and defensive framing.

title: Clarify 'weakest capability sets ceiling' rule
description: capabilities.md states this as absolute rule, then admits exceptions ('adequate' in weaker areas). Needs clarification: is it a hard ceiling or a practical guideline? Add concrete examples.

title: Explain Trident Model reference
description: personas.md line 12 references Trident Model without explanation. Add brief context so readers unfamiliar with it understand the reference.

title: Define Catalyst â†’ Multiplier boundary
description: Framework logic review found the boundary between Catalyst and Multiplier is fuzzy. Both 'design solutions' and 'lead technical discussions'. Clarify: is it scope (team vs multi-team), formality (authority), or something else?

title: Parallelize persona loading with Promise.all
description: Lines 554-566 in app.js: Personas load sequentially (N+1 problem). Use Promise.all to load all persona content in parallel for faster page loads.

title: Address IC track organizational support question
description: Amplifier/Pioneer require external visibility (talks, open source, thought leadership) but no mechanism provided for obtaining org support. Clarify expectations vs organizational enablement.

title: Add error handling for failed content fetches
description: app.js silently fails on icon load errors (line 76-77) and has minimal error handling for content fetches. Add user-visible error states and logging.

title: Remove condescending parentheticals from quick-reference
description: Line 50 in quick-reference.md has patronizing parentheticals: '(are we being realistic?)' and '(am I reading this correctly?)'. Remove or rephrase.

title: Extract duplicate frontmatter parser
description: Identical parser exists in build.js (lines 23-57) and app.js (lines 85-117). 70+ lines of duplicate code. Consider sharing or generating.

title: Add HTML escaping to markdown parser
description: Lines 130-132 in app.js: parseInlineMarkdown doesn't escape HTML, creating XSS vulnerability. Malicious markdown like *<script>* could inject code.

title: Address self-assessment assumption about explicit expectations
description: Self-assessment process assumes expectations were set explicitly but doesn't handle when they weren't. Add guidance for what to do when expectations are unclear before self-assessment.

title: Delete ~370 lines of unused CSS
description: Unused classes include: .persona-badge, .trap-list, .verdict, .signal-card, .growth-principle-section, .guiding-questions, .imbalance-examples, .validation-questions, .contrast-box, .two-column, .rating-cards, .callout-box, .assessment-step, and more. See code review for full list.
